content.description: OpenSea is a leading decentralized marketplace for non-fungible tokens (NFTs), enabling users to buy, sell, mint, and trade digital assets across multiple blockchains. It supports a wide range of NFT categories including art, gaming items, music, and virtual worlds.
content.meta: Explore, buy, and sell NFTs on OpenSea, the largest NFT marketplace across multiple blockchains.
